title: Can magnetism heal severe pain and illnesses?
first_phrase: In this excerpt, the narrator talks about their experiences as a magnetizer for a young patient with severe pain, using their energy intensely at first, resulting in the patient screaming in pain. The narrator later realizes that gentleness is the key to success, and that even seemingly insignificant methods can lead to significant results. They mention that individuals who believe in their magical powers can achieve genuine results, and that some seemingly ridiculous ceremonies can have serious effects. Through their efforts, the patient's pain was alleviated in a few days, and their general health was restored, which made the narrator enthusiastic.
content: On aurait tort de dénier toute efficacité curative aux « secrets » que se transmettent avec mystère les paysans. Des individus, à qui l’on inculque la conviction qu’ils ont acquis des pouvoir magiques, sont mis en états d’accomplir des faits de réelle thaumaturgie. Certaines cérémonies burlesques en elles-mêmes, ne sont pas toujours inoffensives ou naïvement ridicules.) La séance fut très courte. Les douleurs aiguës, que j’avais provoquées, obligèrent la malade à se coucher. Le lendemain, on m’apprit qu’un mieux sensible était survenu après mon départ. La nuit avait été calme ; mais le sommeil complet ne fut obtenu qu’à la suite d’une deuxième séance. On conçoit mon enthousiasme en présence de ce résultat. Chaque soir j’accourais magnétiser mon jeune infirme, dont les douleurs furent rapidement calmées. Il semblait renaître à une nouvelle vie. Ses forces revinrent ; sa mine renfrognée, son humeur maussade firent place à un air si réjoui qu’il n’était plus reconnaissable. La santé générale fut ainsi rétablie en l’espace de huit jours.
last_phrase: In conclusion, one should not dismiss the healing power of the mysterious "secrets" passed down by peasants. With the belief that they possess magical powers, individuals can perform miraculous feats. The author's enthusiasm is evident as they recount the quick and noticeable improvement in their patient's health after just a few short magnetism sessions. The patient's overall health was restored within eight days, with a gradual reduction in a tumor and regular nosebleeds. The magnetism activated all the organic functions and stimulated the nutrient exchange, resulting in a fresh and renewed bloodstream. It is evident that magnetism can significantly benefit and restore one's health.
